_metadata.description: Text processing and analysis platform requirements registry

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > Diff and comparison tools (line-by-line, word-by-word, semantic)
requirements.title: Diff and comparison API endpoint
requirements.description: POST /api/v1/text/diff compares two texts using line-by-line, word-by-word, character, or semantic algorithms and returns structured changes with similarity scores.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > Search and pattern matching (grep, regex, fuzzy search)
requirements.title: Text search and pattern matching API
requirements.description: POST /api/v1/text/search implements regex, plain text, fuzzy, and semantic search with configurable options.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > Text transformation (case, encoding, format conversion)
requirements.title: Text transformation API endpoint
requirements.description: POST /api/v1/text/transform applies case conversion, encoding changes, format transformations, and sanitization operations.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > Text extraction from multiple formats (PDF, HTML, DOCX, images via OCR)
requirements.title: Multi-format text extraction API
requirements.description: POST /api/v1/text/extract extracts text from PDF, HTML, DOCX, and images using OCR with metadata preservation.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > Basic statistics (word count, character count, language detection)
requirements.title: Text statistics API endpoint
requirements.description: Provides word count, character count, language detection, and basic text analysis metrics.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > RESTful API for all core operations
requirements.title: RESTful API implementation
requirements.description: Implements comprehensive RESTful API with proper error handling, authentication, and documentation.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P0 > CLI interface with full feature parity
requirements.title: CLI interface with API parity
requirements.description: Command-line interface providing all API functionality with Unix-friendly input/output and piping support.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Semantic search using embeddings (via Ollama)
requirements.title: Semantic search with embeddings
requirements.description: Semantic search using Ollama-generated embeddings stored in vector database for conceptual matching.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Text summarization and condensation
requirements.title: AI-powered text summarization
requirements.description: Text summarization using Ollama integration with configurable length and style parameters.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Entity extraction (names, dates, locations, emails, URLs)
requirements.title: Named entity extraction
requirements.description: Extracts named entities including names, dates, locations, emails, URLs with confidence scores.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Sentiment and tone analysis
requirements.title: Sentiment and tone analysis
requirements.description: Analyzes text sentiment and tone using AI models with numerical scores and categorical labels.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Text sanitization (PII removal, HTML cleaning)
requirements.title: Text sanitization and PII removal
requirements.description: Sanitizes text by removing PII, cleaning HTML, and stripping dangerous content.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Multi-language support and translation
requirements.title: Multi-language translation support
requirements.description: Translation capabilities for multiple languages using Ollama integration.

requirements.prd_ref: Operational Targets > P1 > Batch processing for multiple files
requirements.title: Batch file processing
requirements.description: Batch processing endpoint for applying operations to multiple files efficiently.
